agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Dade Phelan HB 350 Blanco Relating to the composition of the cybersecurity council. HB 351 Blanco Relating to emergency management for cyber attacks against this state. HB 450 Turner, Chris | et al. Relating to public access to personal financial statements filed by public officials and candidates. HB 888 Landgraf | et al. Relating to creating the criminal offense of misrepresenting a child as a family member at a port of entry. HB 935 Bucy Relating to the designation of certain election days as state holidays. HB 952 Hernandez Relating to diaper changing stations in restrooms in buildings accessible to the public. HB 1001 Israel Relating to whom certain violations of the law by a state or local governmental entity may be reported. HB 1438 Turner, Chris Relating to the contents of and public access to personal financial statements filed by public officials and candidates. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
